description:
Sponsored by Made Talent - [https://www.madetalent.co.uk/](https://www.madetalent.co.uk/)
Location: Made Talent , 31 Great George St, Bristol BS1 5QD

AGENDA
**18.00 – 18:30 Meet & Greet**
\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-
**18:30 - 19:30 AI: Using 'emergence architecture' to create the perfect chatbot**

**Speaker: Chris Booth**

**Abstract:**
Language models have demonstrated incredible performance but carry many risks, making them difficult to use in public-facing chatbots. This talk covers how we leverage the emergence effect to solve these issues and reach the end game of creating a 'perfect chatbot'.

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-
**19:30 - 20:00 Pizza and Networking**

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-
**20:00 - 20:15 Applicable research experiments with DVC and VScode**

**Speaker: Alon Samuel**

**Abstract:**
How to build a pipeline from raw data into a working model with results with Data Version Control. Track changes with VS code. And the power of changing and researching each step of the way while keeping the pipeline working.

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-
**20:15 - Pub**
\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**About Made Talent**
We engage passionate people to build communities of highly skilled talent who want to apply their skills for good. We supply this passionate talent into the Tech for Good sector and increase recruitment and retention success for Tech for Good businesses. We help new people apply their skills for good across booming industries in the Tech for Good world.
title: AI: Using 'emergence architecture' to create the perfect chatbot, and DVC
